actions.name: CancelCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a cluster job

actions.name: CancelJob
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel the specified job

actions.name: CreateAddress
actions.description: Grants permission to create an address for a Snowball to be shipped to

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create an empty cluster

actions.name: CreateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to creates a job to import or export data between Amazon S3 and your on-premises data center

actions.name: CreateLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to creates a LongTermPricingListEntry for allowing customers to add an upfront billing contract for a job

actions.name: CreateReturnShippingLabel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a shipping label that will be used to return the Snow device to AWS

actions.name: DescribeAddress
actions.description: Grants permission to get specific details about that address in the form of an Address object

actions.name: DescribeAddresses
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a specified number of ADDRESS objects

actions.name: DescribeCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to describe information about a specific cluster including shipping information, cluster status, and other important metadata

actions.name: DescribeJob
actions.description: Grants permission to describe information about a specific job including shipping information, job status, and other important metadata

actions.name: DescribeReturnShippingLabel
actions.description: Grants permission to describe information on the shipping label of a Snow device that is being returned to AWS

actions.name: GetJobManifest
actions.description: Grants permission to get a link to an Amazon S3 presigned URL for the manifest file associated with the specified JobId value

actions.name: GetJobUnlockCode
actions.description: Grants permission to get the UnlockCode code value for the specified job

actions.name: GetSnowballUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the Snowball service limit for your account, and also the number of Snowballs your account has in use

actions.name: GetSoftwareUpdates
actions.description: Grants permission to return an Amazon S3 presigned URL for an update file associated with a specified JobId

actions.name: ListClusterJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list JobListEntry objects of the specified length

actions.name: ListClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to list ClusterListEntry objects of the specified length

actions.name: ListCompatibleImages
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the different Amazon EC2 Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) that are owned by your AWS account that would be supported for use on a Snow device

actions.name: ListJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list JobListEntry objects of the specified length

actions.name: ListLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to list LongTermPricingListEntry objects for the account making the request

actions.name: ListServiceVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all supported versions for Snow on-device services

actions.name: UpdateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to update while a cluster's ClusterState value is in the AwaitingQuorum state, you can update some of the information associated with a cluster

actions.name: UpdateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to update while a job's JobState value is New, you can update some of the information associated with a job

actions.name: UpdateJobShipmentState
actions.description: Grants permission to update the state when a the shipment states changes to a different state

actions.name: UpdateLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific upfront billing contract for a job
